module.name: geometric_validation_property_representation
module.keywords: module, geometric validation properties, centroid, surface area, volume.
module.purpose: This part of ISO 10303 specifies an application module for the representation of geometric validation properties of solid or surface models. These enable geometric translations or transformations performed during an exchange of geometric data to be validated.

inscope.li: assignment of geometric validation properties to individual solid or surface models. These properties include centroid, volume, and total surface area for solids. For surface models the properties addressed are centroid and surface area.

outscope.li: assignment of properties for representations that are not solid or surface models or assemblies of solids or surface models;
assignment of any properties to a product or its definition.

uof.name: Geometric_Validation_Property_Representation
uof.description: The Geometric_Validation_Property_Representation UoF specifies the data structure for the representation of geometric validation properties for solid or surface models.
